page.title: 09Ladywell Cottage.
page.content: We went to Ladywell Cottage. At the bottom of the steps there was a statue of Mary and a well. The well was different from stone wells, this one was square with no wall and the water did not freeze in winter.A nun opened a gate, she had some gardening tools in her hands. She said "Go in the garden and I'll tell you more about the well. She said that Holy Child nuns look after the cottage. Fergus McGuire found the well. At sea he heard someone say "find a well with a crab apple tree in Ferryhalgh", he had never heard of the place. He went to an inn and a maid said "Sorry I'm late, my cow strayed to Ferry halgh". He asked her where Ferryhalgh was. He found the well and the tree and built a statue.
